snippet: Prime Minister David Cameron and Alex Salmond, the Scottish first minister, signed an agreement laying out the details for a referendum on Scottish independence.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron and Alex Salmond, Scottish first minister, sign agreement laying out details for referendum on Scottish independence in fall of 2014, ending months of preliminary sparring.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister David Cameron and Alex Salmond, the Scottish first minister, signed an agreement laying out the details for a referendum on Scottish independence.

headline.seo: British Leaders to Sign Agreement on Scottish Independence Vote
headline.main: Agreement Signed on Scottish Independence Vote
headline.print_headline: Agreement Signed on Scottish Independence Vote
